summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackMoroccanoil Dry Texture Spray is a dry, argan-oil-infused texturizer for tousled, undone styles with lasting hold and volume.
details: DetailsBenefitsFor effortlessly undone stylesVolumizingLong-lasting holdNo-slip, gritty finishTouchable, non-sticky textureKey IngredientsArgan Oil: Restores elasticity, smoothness, and manageability to hairZeolite: Provides grit, texture, and odor absorptionHydrolyzed Wheat Protein: Conditions and moisturizes the hairItem 2644270How To UseShake well, hold can 8--10 inches (20--25 cm) away from dry hair and spray in even strokes. Tousle for extra volume and movement.Caution: EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE AEROSOL. Contents under pressure. Do not place in hot water or near radiators, stoves, or other sources of heat. Do not puncture or incinerate container or store at temperatures over 50¬∞C (122¬∞F). Do not use in presence of open flame or spark. Avoid spraying in eyes. May burst if heated. Protect from sunlight. Avoid fire, flame, and smoking during use and until hair is thoroughly dry. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children. Use only as directed.IngredientsHydrofluorocarbon 152a, Butane, Sd Alcohol 40-B (Alcohol Denat.), Vp/Va Copolymer, Zeolite, Isobutane, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Acetyl Triethyl Citrate, Glycerin, PEG/PPG-17/18 Dimethicone, Amp-Isostearoyl Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Methoxycinnamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Benzoic Acid, EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Hexamethylindanopyran, Linalyl Acetate, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes. MOTS04Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Shake well, hold can 8--10 inches (20--25 cm) away from dry hair and spray in even strokes. Tousle for extra volume and movement.Caution: EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE AEROSOL. Contents under pressure. Do not place in hot water or near radiators, stoves, or other sources of heat. Do not puncture or incinerate container or store at temperatures over 50¬∞C (122¬∞F). Do not use in presence of open flame or spark. Avoid spraying in eyes. May burst if heated. Protect from sunlight. Avoid fire, flame, and smoking during use and until hair is thoroughly dry. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children. Use only as directed.

reviews.headline: Great For Styling!
reviews.comments: I have really oily scalp. Skipping just one day of shampoo makes my hair super greasy but this dry texture spray is a life saver for people like me. It has a super long lasting hold! Gifted by moroccanoil. I love how it doesn't have any white residue but works great! Makes my hair look fresh and clean and perfect after styling!

reviews.headline: Really liked this one
reviews.comments: Really good texture spray. It adds grip and fullness so my curls hold longer and updos don't slip. I just have to use a light hand or it can feel a little gritty, but overall it's become a go-to for me. Gifted by Moroccanoil

reviews.headline: Healthy and VOLUMINOUS hair is SO back!!
reviews.comments: My health has been killing the healthiness of my hair too. But this dry texture spray might just be my life saver. Smells so good and actually works so fast. Just used my hands to shake in the formula and it left no white cast. Small and practical so best believe it's going everywhere with me. Complimentary from moroccanoil ü´ê

reviews.headline: Adds Volume
reviews.comments: I received this product complimentary from Moroccan Oil. I have straight, fairly flat hair and this adds a good amount of volume to it. It has that good Moroccan oil scent. The only con is that it does make your hair feel a bit crispy and the product texture is noticeable.

reviews.headline: Amazing Product!
reviews.comments: I may have long hair but it's so flat! I was gifted by moroccan oil with their dry texture spray and I could not wait to try it. I used it after giving myself a blowout. Despite washing my hair the day prior, it really helped hold the blowout and my hair felt more voluminous!

reviews.headline: Great!
reviews.comments: The first time I tried this, I was surprised by how powerfully it sprayed out, I almost got my eye! I could instantly feel the texture working to give my hair volume. It smells amazing, doesn't leave a white cast, and makes styling so easy. This product was kindly gifted by Moroccanoil for review purposes

reviews.headline: Volume must have
reviews.comments: I have thin, straight hair and this texture spray does a great job at adding volume and fullness to my hair. It smells great and is easy to use, though you do have to be careful not to add too much. I love the texture and life it adds to my hairstyles. Gifted by moroccanoil

reviews.headline: Amazing product
reviews.comments: I received the Moroccanoil Dry Texture Spray 60ml, complimentary from Moroccanoil, and it has really impressed me. It gives my hair natural looking volume and hold without that heavy, sticky feeling. I like that it adds a bit of grit and texture so my style looks effortless but still stays in place. Easy to use, lightweight, and leaves my hair touchable. A solid pick if you want a natural, lived in style that actually lasts.

reviews.headline: must have when styling!
reviews.comments: as always, moroccanoil has the best scented hair products- smells fresh, clean and not over powering or too fragrant at all. one thing i look out for in hairsprays and texture sprays is how well i can run my fingers thru my hair and still keep the volume/hold strong. i despise crunchy hair that feels like straw and this texture spray is perfect! i used it to give my roots a bit more volume and it worked so well! gifted by moroccanoil but this review is 100% honest

reviews.headline: Nice
reviews.comments: Gifted by Moroccan oil this product was gifted in exchange for a review. First off the product smells great. I feel like it gives volume and helps to complete the style.. it is nice to help add volume to it!!

reviews.headline: NEW FAVORITE DRY SHAMPOO :)
reviews.comments: This product was gifted by Moroccanoil and I absolutely LOVE it! It leaves my hair smelling so fresh and feeling so clean. A lot of other dry shampoos make my scalp feel dry, but this one doesn't. I highly recommend.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: Gifted by moroccanoil I love this product! The spray adds so much texture and dimension to my hair (and I have a lot of hair lol). Doesn't require too much product so I would definitely be repurchasing this one.

reviews.headline: Will 100% be repurchasing
reviews.comments: *Gifted by moroccanoil* This texture spray is truly game changing for fine, thin haired girls like myself. This spray gives so much texture and volume to my hair. My blowouts will literally last so long now!

reviews.headline: Amazing spray
reviews.comments: What an amazing spray ! My wife and I use this every day ! Give us style, smell and volumes . We love the size because we travel a lot and works for us perfectly!! I will definitely get the bigger size to have at home ! So happy

reviews.headline: **Great for a night out, not an everyday go-to**
reviews.comments:
I was gifted by moroccanoil this texture spray and I've really enjoyed trying it out! The spray itself is super easy to use and gives a nice boost of volume and hold. It definitely adds some drama and texture to my hair ‚Äî perfect for a night out or when I want to elevate my look a bit more.

That said, it's a bit too heavy for everyday wear (at least for my hair type), so I reserve it for special occasions when I want extra hold and style. If you're looking for something bold and noticeable, this is a great pick!

reviews.headline: Volume!!!
reviews.comments: Absolutely love this product and have for a really long time. Super happy this brand is at Ulta now because this is an absolute need for my Ulta runs. This product give so much texture and volume to my blow outs and I love using it to touch up second or third day hair when it is falling flat!! Also this product was gifted to me in exchange for an honest review!

reviews.headline: Love this spray
reviews.comments: I have been loving this texture spray. It makes my hair look like it has volume and it smells amazing. It doesn't make my hair extra greasy or textured it's an Amazing spray if you just want to add that extra volume in your hair. Gifted by moroccanoil

reviews.headline: My go-to!
reviews.comments: Lately I've been gravitating towards the dry texture spray over dry shampoo. It feels lighter on my hair and gives me volume without weighing my hair down. Dry shampoo tends to not last on me and will make my hair greasy fast. Gifted by moroccanoil

reviews.headline: Looove
reviews.comments: I love how this leaves my hair! It is not heavy and easy to apply. I also love the scent that it leaves in you hair. A 10/10 would recommend! This was Complimentary from moroccanoil but I would 100% repurchase!

reviews.headline: So good!
reviews.comments: The Dry Texture Spray complimentary from Moroccanoil is my secret weapon for volume and that effortless, "lived-in" look. It gives my hair instant body and texture without feeling sticky or stiff. I love using it on clean hair when it's too soft to hold a style, or on curls and waves to make them look more natural and undone. It also gives a nice grip for braids and ponytails, so styles stay in place. The finish is lightweight and touchable, and of course, it smells amazing like all Moroccanoil products.

media.headline: Amazing product for that aesthetic volume

faceoff_positive.comments: Gifted by Moroccanoil in exchange for my honest review. The Moroccanoil Dry Texture Spray is such a versatile styling product that instantly elevates my hair routine. From the first spritz, it adds effortless volume and a perfectly tousled texture without making my hair feel stiff or sticky. I love how it gives that "undone but polished" look ‚Äî like natural body with a touch of glamour. What really stands out is how lightweight it feels. Unlike some texture sprays that can leave a heavy or gritty residue, this one keeps my hair soft and touchable while still holding the style. It also helps refresh my hair on days I skip washing, giving it more life and movement. And of course, it carries the signature Moroccanoil scent ‚Äî fresh, slightly sweet, and luxurious ‚Äî which makes using it an enjoyable part of my styling routine. The 60ml size is perfect for on-the-go touch-ups or travel, yet still lasts a long time since a little goes a long way. Overall, this spray delivers the perfect balance of texture, volume, and flexibility. It's ideal for creating everyday waves, adding body before an updo, or just giving hair that effortless boost of style.
faceoff_positive.headline: Lightweight, Touchable Hold with a Luxe Scent

faceoff_negative.comments: My health has been killing the healthiness of my hair too. But this dry texture spray might just be my life saver. Smells so good and actually works so fast. Just used my hands to shake in the formula and it left no white cast. Small and practical so best believe it's going everywhere with me. Complimentary from moroccanoil ü´ê
faceoff_negative.headline: Healthy and VOLUMINOUS hair is SO back!!
